metadata.summary: Configure lookups as key-value dictionaries in the Config Hive for use in detection and response rules with support for multiple data formats
metadata.primary_use_case: Create and manage lookups for threat intelligence and indicator matching in D&R rules

extracted_apis.description: Create a lookup in the lookup hive

cross_refs.description: Understanding Config Hive structure is essential before working with lookups
Provides detailed information on lookup formats and D&R rule integration
